column4: "Version of PEAT that performed the scan
"ID of the PEAT run for this scan. This is the value of ``agent.id`` in Elasticsearch. Used for associating other artifacts (e.g. device files) with this particular scan."
"PEAT device modules used to perform the scan"
"Targets used by the scan. These are the actual targets used after PEAT has parsed them into usable targets and removed duplicates."

column6: "Original arguments used for the scan. This is the targets as provided by the user prior to PEAT parsing them into usable targets and removing duplicates."

column4: "Number of hosts that responded but were not verified"
IDs of hosts that responded. Note: this does NOT include verified hosts!
"Information from hosts that were successfully verified"
